✔ The app has 1000 important GRE words with example but you can also add words of your own.
✔ You can add note or mnemonic to help remember the word better.
✔ Word rating is just a gauge for relative difficulty. Higher rating means the word is relatively harder. Initially all words have highest rating. If you know a word its rating drops down and it becomes less likely to appear in flashcard later. On the other hand not knowing a word increases its rating and makes it more likely to appear.
✔ Word rating can be disabled from settings menu.
